attributes.action: UK registered companies who pay proper UK tax only to receive Bail-Out Funds
attributes.additional_details: In the same way tax payer is now - rightly - coming to the aid of UK Tax Payers, in their hour of need - big business - or individuals - who are based off-shore and avoid tax, should not be considered for UK tax-Payers money.
attributes.background:
Companies pretending to be BRITISH, but registered off-shore should contact their local tax-haven for a bail-out

Including - those companies that do a lot of business in The UK but bill all their invoices via Dublin for example.
